comment.author: 29951694@N07
comment._content:
The SS Clan Maccorquodale was at the Gallipolli landings on Anzac day, i have a copy of a letter written by a crew member at that time.
The ship was later torpedoed and sunk by a U-Boat off Alexandria on November 15 1917.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content:
thanks for the extra information. I will pass onto the curatorial team.
Karen Roberts, Online Services
